mapper.select: SELECT ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_PW, ADMIN_VISIT_DATE FROM ADMIN_TABLE WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{admin_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE ADMIN_TABLE SET ADMIN_VISIT_DATE = sysdate WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{admin_id}
mapper.select: select o.ord_code, o.member_id, o.ord_name, o.ord_tel, p.pay_method, o.ord_price, o.ord_regdate from ORDER_TBL o INNER JOIN PAYMENT p ON o.ord_code = p.odr_code WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 order by o.ord_code desc
